website_summaries.verdict: Loose powder L-Arginine supplement with a tart taste and an easy-to-mix form.
pros: High-quality ingredients packaged in an FDA-inspected, GMP facility
Fruit extracts used to flavor product, and most consumers were okay with the taste, since unflavored L-arginine tastes bad
Manufacturer claims its container holds more product than competitors'
The overwhelming majority of users like this product
cons: High cost, powder form arguably less convenient to use than capsules
Some consumers did not like the tart taste, and others complained about stomach upset
Small percentage said they saw no significant benefit from product

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. My husband suffers from high blood pressure and since being on this he is no longer on any blood pressure medicine. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Heart health and energy benefits!
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for a month, I truly noticed a difference in my energy level during the day. I primarily bought it to help reduce my slightly elevated blood pressure and it works great! The boost in energy is a definite bonus. I tried another product for 2 months prior and didn't notice the benefits that this product has given to me. Therefore, I placed a new order this month and hope to continue ordering it month by month.
customer_reviews.author: Al C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great for blood flow.
customer_reviews.text: The greatest ever. After using this great product for a couple months now I noticed that my varicose veins are getting smaller and it feels like your using a low dose of viagra every day. Definitely a sign of excellent blood flow. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kareldejong1

customer_reviews.title: WISH I COULD GIVE IT 10 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: My blood pressure has been creeping up over the last 2 years. I am hypothyroid and have had coronary artery disease since age 26. My last appt with cardiologist they put me on Lorastan and it made me more fatigued, I was getting heavy legs at night and had a headache everyday. So after a month I went off BP meds. I needed to attempt to bring it down naturally. THIS PRODUCT AFTER ONE WEEK HAS DROPPED MY BP BY 10 POINTS!! I also have a little more energy! No afternoon nap required. This is after 1 week! I am so pleased with this product it may be the answer to help my cardiovascular system!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great for heart health!
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is amazing! My 87 year old father has been taking this for 6 months now; after month 3 his blood pressure had been reduced by 20 points both diastolic and systolic (140/90 down to 120/70) - he is now only taking his blood pressure medication every other day which was reduced by half as well! My husband and I both take this as well and feel great, have more energy and our blood pressures have both improved. I would recommend this product for improved cardiovascular health for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Miller

I have tried dozens of products over the past 20 years and nothing has come close to resolving my problems like L-Arginine Pro.

customer_reviews.title: Great and Effective NO2 Booster
customer_reviews.text: I hadn’t used the product until recently. The big plus here is the clinically effective dose of both l-Arginine at 5500mg and l-Citrulline at 1100mg in one scoop. This is a No Sugar formula, naturally sweetened with Stevia that tastes great. They’ve also added an assortment vitamins and sea minerals. This is a quality product from a company that cares about their customers. Just buy it already!

customer_reviews.title: Loving my L-Arginine Pro!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this product every morning before working out and I have to say I feel great when I'm working out. I feel stronger and have noticed a boost in my energy level during my workout and throughout the day. I definitely attribute it to the L-Arginine Pro because I haven't changed anything else in my diet. As a bonus it also has a really nice berry flavor, mixes easily with water and tastes great and refreshing when I mix it with ice and cold water. I will continue to buy this product. I am very happy with the results and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to improve their energy, workouts as well as their cardio health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: L-arginine Pro
customer_reviews.text: I am 63 years old and a dedicated exercise and health food advocate. This product helps my body create the Nitic oxide I need for increased blood flow for my workouts, the Nitric Oxide helps smooth the arterial walls which in turn, helps lower my blood pressure. The taste is great, it mixes completely with a few stirs and increases energy as well. I recommend this product to anyone wishing to feel more alive in the morning and lower their need to drink too much coffee.

customer_reviews.title: Effective for blood pressure treatment, tastes like crap
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to achieve a healthier blood pressure, and it works for me. I've had high blood pressure since the age of 16 and my body has been extremely resistant to blood pressure medicines. Prescription medicines that do work for me make me feel very tired, ill, and cranky. I take 1 scoop in the morning and 1 scoop in the evening and with the addition of CoQ-10 I have a healthy blood pressure and no side effects! The downside - this stuff tastes like crap. But hey, you can't have it all. I'll force this #$%^ down if it helps my blood pressure and has no side effects,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: After my last brand went out of business, I tried a few others. This is now my NO precursor of choice. Good stuff!

customer_reviews.text: It is a great product - been taking it for about a month now- I have a great deal more energy I believe it helped my heart - this is just my opinion but no proof- since my heart exam went great after I started the product - before it there was a problem on the electrocardiogram - The other reviews sold me plus a review in an article on the internet Will post more later after I have used it for a longer period of time-just got my second jar

customer_reviews.title: Rating vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to rate a vitamin supplement. I’ve been taking this for several years and I am almost 70 years old. I’m taking different vitamins and just trying to stay healthy. I’ve never been on any meds but I Can’t say it is because of this product. But I can’t say it’s not either.

customer_reviews.title: no scoop
customer_reviews.text: All the instructions read 1 scoop. Even some Q&A says, yes, definitely comes with a scoop. Maybe mine was the defective jar.....NO scoop! In the absence of that, instructions should also state 1tsp/tblsp etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
